title: NA to Garena Account Transfer
body:
I started playing League on NA Server because my friends were on that server and I wasnt aware of Garena atm.
I have 50 + champions on NA and it would be great if there was a way to transfer my account from NA to Garena.
I play from India.

NA ping: 270 ms
Garena ping: 60 ms

Is there a way to transfer my NA account to Garena. I dont want my rank or anything of the sort just my champion,skins,emotes and level.

replies.body: Since Riot Games and Garena are different companies, and the servers for Garena are completely separate, we can't transfer accounts into or out of Garena. You'll need to create a new account on their servers in order to play there.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4A9YXJBf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-19T02:26:31.994+0000)
>
> Since Riot Games and Garena are different companies, and the servers for Garena are completely separate, we can't transfer accounts into or out of Garena. You'll need to create a new account on their servers in order to play there.

Alright thank you so much.

Unfortunately you can't. Riot and Garena are two separate companies. Garena simply bought the rights to host the game on their servers.
Riot have nothing to do with them as such.

I would however suggest looking at what MS you would get to Russia or Turkey servers, as these are closer to your location.

Otherwise you should just create a new Garena account, they have a really nice levelling system where you get a lot of BE and champion from levelling.
